name: Basketball 3D Slam n Jam
description:
Pass the ball! Dribble down the court, shoot the 3 pointer or go in for the slam dunk. This is a simple basketball game that anyone can play and enjoy. Race down the court and avoid the other team players. Is it March Madness? No, its just Shoot n Jam Basketball 3D.

Features:
--Each game is played in 40 seconds
--Its hard, but you can win
--Super fun 3D graphics
--Imagine yourself as though you are playing in the NCAA tournament
--Hey, it's your fantasy, you can imagine playing anywhere in the world.

If you enjoy playing football, baseball, or soccer games, you are going to enjoy playing Shoot n Jam Basketball 3D. Nice shot!
